channel.title: Bpm on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in Bpm on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Internal training: BPM: Process and tools for developers
item.description:
At a client, I’ve presented today an internal training on “BPM: Process and tools for developers”

In it, we have introduced the BPM concept and the main ideas in Activiti BPM.

Also techniques for hotswapping processes, tips and how-tos.
